channel.title: GNN on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in GNN on Memo Tut

item.title: I tried to classify MNIST by GNN (with PyTorch geometric)
item.description: #Introduction Hello My name is DNA1980. Recently GNN(Graph Neural Network) is popular. I also want to follow the flow and handle graphs, but there are many graph data in the world that I do not know well. I don’t know what I’m doing when I classify… Separately, I think that GNN can be applied if it can be dropped into a graph even if it does not have a graph structure from the beginning like a network, so I tried applying it to everyone’s favorite MNIST.
